database.name: VIEW RV_C_INVOICE_CUSTOMERPRODQTR
database.view: SELECT il.AD_Client_ID, il.AD_Org_ID, il.C_BPartner_ID, il.M_Product_Category_ID, TRUNC(il.DateInvoiced, 'Q') AS DateInvoiced, -- DD Day, DY Week, MM Month SUM(LineNetAmt) AS LineNetAmt, SUM(LineListAmt) AS LineListAmt, SUM(LineLimitAmt) AS LineLimitAmt, SUM(LineDiscountAmt) AS LineDiscountAmt, (CASE SUM(LineListAmt) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM(LineListAmt)-SUM(LineNetAmt))/SUM(LineListAmt)*100,2) END) AS LineDiscount, SUM(LineOverLimitAmt) AS LineOverLimitAmt, (CASE SUM(LineNetAmt) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 100-ROUND((SUM(LineNetAmt)-SUM(LineOverLimitAmt))/SUM(LineNetAmt)*100,2) END) AS LineOverLimit, SUM(QtyInvoiced) AS QtyInvoiced FROM RV_C_InvoiceLine il GROUP BY il.AD_Client_ID, il.AD_Org_ID, il.C_BPartner_ID, il.M_Product_Category_ID, TRUNC(il.DateInvoiced, 'Q')
